drug-interaction.name: Picosulfuric acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Picosulfuric acid can be decreased when used in combination with Pristinamycin.

drug-interaction.name: BCG vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Pristinamycin.

drug-interaction.name: Typhoid vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Pristinamycin.

drug-interaction.name: Dicoumarol
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Pristinamycin is combined with Dicoumarol.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Pristinamycin is combined with Phenindione.
